metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9923 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
pax_decode_header in sparse.c in GNU Tar before 1.32 had a NULL pointer dereference when parsing certain archives that have malformed extended headers.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tar - 1.28-2.1ubuntu0.2
tar-scripts - 1.28-2.1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tar package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.28-2.1ubuntu0.2').
